solution_line_template: On the way to the library, Trent went {blocks_to_bus_stop} blocks + {blocks_bus_to_library} blocks = <<{blocks_to_bus_stop}+{blocks_bus_to_library}={blocks_to_library}>>{blocks_to_library} blocks.
Trent came home the same way so he went {blocks_to_library} blocks + {blocks_to_library} blocks = <<{blocks_to_library}+{blocks_to_library}={total_blocks_traveled}>>{total_blocks_traveled} blocks.
